Package edu.monash.fit2099.engine.items

Class Item

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.GameEntity
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.items.Item
All Implemented Interfaces:
Printable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Bloodberry, HealingVial, MartianItem, OldKey, RefreshingFlask, Rune, WeaponItem
public abstract class Item extends GameEntity implements Printable
Abstract base class representing a physical object in the game world.

    • portable

      protected boolean portable

  • Constructor Details

    • Item

      public Item(String name, char displayChar, boolean portable)
      Constructor.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of this Item
      displayChar - the character to use to represent this item if it is on the ground
      portable - true if and only if the Item can be picked up

  • Method Details

    • tick

      public void tick(Location currentLocation, Actor actor)
      Inform a carried Item of the passage of time. This method is called once per turn, if the Item is being carried.
      Parameters:
      currentLocation - The location of the actor carrying this Item.
      actor - The actor carrying this Item.

    • tick

      public void tick(Location currentLocation)
      Inform an Item on the ground of the passage of time. This method is called once per turn, if the item rests upon the ground.
      Parameters:
      currentLocation - The location of the ground on which we lie.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object

      Specified by:
      getDisplayChar in interface Printable
      Returns:
      display character of an instance

    • setDisplayChar

      protected final void setDisplayChar(char displayChar)
      Update display character
      Parameters:
      displayChar - e.g., 'a', 'c', '#'

    • getPickUpAction

      public PickUpAction getPickUpAction(Actor actor)
      Create and return an action to pick this Item up. If this Item is not portable, returns null.
      Returns:
      a new PickUpItemAction if this Item is portable, null otherwise.

    • getDropAction

      public DropAction getDropAction(Actor actor)
      Create and return an action to drop this Item. If this Item is not portable, returns null.
      Returns:
      a new DropItemAction if this Item is portable, null otherwise.

    • togglePortability

      public void togglePortability()
      Switch portability from 'true' to 'false', set portability to true allows the item to be picked up or dropped by actor.
      See Also:
      • to pick-up item
      • to drop item

    • allowableActions

      public ActionList allowableActions(Location location)
      List of allowable actions that can be performed on the item when it is on the ground Example #1: a trap can return an action to disarm the trap.
      Parameters:
      location - the location of the ground on which the item lies
      Returns:
      an unmodifiable list of Actions

    • allowableActions

      public ActionList allowableActions(Actor owner)
      List of allowable actions that the item can perform to the current actor Example #1: a healing item can have a special skill that can increase the current actor's hitpoints.
      Parameters:
      owner - the actor that owns the item
      Returns:
      an unmodifiable list of Actions

    • allowableActions

      public ActionList allowableActions(Actor otherActor, Location location)
      List of allowable actions that the item allows its owner do to other actor. Example #1: a weapon can return an attacking action to the other actor. Example #2: if the weapon has a special ability, it can return an action to use the special ability. Example #3: a food can return an action to feed the other actor.
      Parameters:
      otherActor - the other actor
      location - the location of the other actor
      Returns:
      an unmodifiable list of Actions
